author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
Upon the shores of distant Überseas,
The green-eyed Amazon starts to squeeze, 
With Microsoft, they cast a looming shroud,
A dance of power, quiet yet loud.

The Dollar, once so proud and stout,
Now weaker, it incites some doubt.
But fret thee not, for this decline,
Is but fleeting, as the divine.

In German lands, Bunds they weave,
A bolster 'round the yield they perceive.
Yet signs of peace hide from the light,
Eternal struggle, day and night.

feedItems.title: Amazon, Microsoft Cloud Services Face U.K. Probe
feedItems.description: The U.K.’s communications regulator has referred the cloud market to the country’s competition watchdog for an investigation, alleging that certain features by market leaders Amazon and Microsoft could limit competition.

feedItems.title: Dollar's Falls Are Likely To Be Temporary
feedItems.description: The dollar edged lower after Wednesday’s weaker-than-expected ADP employment survey but these falls are unlikely to last and gains for the euro and sterling against the U.S. currency should be temporary, UniCredit Research said.

feedItems.title: German Bunds Find Support But New Highs Likely to Be Tested Again
feedItems.description: It is encouraging that Bunds are finding support around crucial yield levels, but signs of lasting relief aren’t in sight, Commerzbank Research said.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
Fell the output, bound under gold,
In mighty France, where tales be told.
For coins that jingle have their hold,
Like goats, led astray from the fold.

Beumelburg speaks with words so bold,
Of changes warm and tales of cold.
Rabbits hop forth, deeds of old,
Through innovation, new paths unfold.

In Casino's lore, a deal foretold,
To snail-like pace, creditors hold. 
For fortunes wane and debts uphold,
Like dogs bark at shadows in the cold.

feedItems.title: French Industry Data Slips, Denting Previous Trends
feedItems.description: French industrial output fell 0.3% in August, suggesting a tight monetary environment, following successive interest-rate increases in the eurozone, is weighing on demand.

feedItems.title: Q&A With the Sustainability Chief of Oilfield-Services Firm SLB
feedItems.description: Katharina Beumelburg, CSO of the company formerly known as Schlumberger, discusses an epiphany in Greenland and her belief that engineering and innovation are the answers to climate change.

feedItems.title: Casino Reaches Restructuring Agreement With Creditors
feedItems.description: Casino said it had entered a lock-up agreement with secured creditors related to its financial restructuring.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
From German lands, the profits dip,
Less than foreseen, in trader's grip.
Both wares sent forth and those received,
Downcast they be, traders aggrieved.

In Nihon's market, stocks ascend,
On realty and auto they depend.
The fear of borrowing costs do mute,
As gain in stocks bears golden fruit.

Hearken Pandora! In ventures bold,
Their guidance new, their profits foretold.
To boost their brand and shops they strive,
In faith, their earnings shall surely thrive.

feedItems.title: Germany's Trade Surplus Falls Less Than Expected
feedItems.description: Germany’s adjusted trade surplus decreased by less than expected to 16.6 billion in August, as both exports and imports declined.

feedItems.title: Nikkei Rises 1.8%, Led by real estate, Auto Stocks
feedItems.description: Japanese shares ended higher, led by gains in real estate, auto and bank stocks, as the U.S. bond-market rout eased, alleviating concerns about higher borrowing costs.

feedItems.title: Pandora Scales Up Investments; Sets New Guidance
feedItems.description: Pandora said it now targets organic growth of 7%-9% from 2023 to 2026 and an EBIT of DKK8.8-9.7 billion by 2026, adding it is increasing investments in brand desirability and the store network.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
Boustead's plot lay bare to the winds of trade,
To conquer fertile fields where green gold is made.
Yet a bold holder dared step in, a savior true,
As dark clouds retreated, the sun light anew.

Hong Kong's markets, once a tempest fierce,
Now lay stagnant, their mighty roars cease.
Foreign wolves retreat to their distant den,
In the silent halls, we ask, where go the men?

To the Ozempic era turn America's eyes,
As the food giants tremble 'fore the shifting tides.
Seven in a hundred shall seek the elixir,
On this mighty journey, we face a new fixture.

feedItems.title: Boustead Plantations Stake Sale Fails, But Deal Is Still On
feedItems.description: Boustead Plantations’ shares surged Thursday with a key shareholder stepping in with an offer for the palm-oil producer after another company withdrew from a stake-acquisition deal.

feedItems.title: Where Have the Traders Gone? A $4 Trillion Market Is Stuck in a Rut
feedItems.description: Hong Kong’s stock market has stalled, trading volumes are slumping and foreign investors are backing away.

feedItems.title: America's Food Giants Confront the Ozempic Era
feedItems.description: Nearly 7% of the U.S. population is projected to be on weight-loss drugs in 2035.
